Products

Desktop Computers and Server Systems

Relacom Technologies Ltd is authorized system resellers of IBM, Sony and Toshiba. We also have access to a large range of other IT brands such as... DELL, HP, ACER, ASUS, Toshiba, NEC, Samsung and many more! We also assemble the unbranded systems of AMD and Intel on customer Requirement at very low cost.


Notebook Computers

We are agents for Hewlett Packard, Toshiba, Sony, IBM ThinkPad, Lenovo, ASUS, NEC and ACER.


Printers

Relacom Technologies Ltd is an agent for Epson, Canon, Brother, Hewlett Packard, Kyocera and Oki. We have access to multifunction printers as well as color laser printers to suit all business types.


Software

We are agents for Microsoft Software, Novell Netware, Linux, Apple OS configuration and other Specialist software e.g. CAD programmes and we have access to a wide range of special interest software.

 

Consumables

We have a range of Inkjet cartridges and toner cartridges. We also stock CD-Rs, CD-RWs, +/-DVD-Rs & +/- DVD-RWs and tape cartridges.

 

Peripheral Devices & Accessories

Peripheral devices we have access to are Scanners, CD Combo writers, DVD writers, external hard drives, USB Pen drives, Tape Backup Drives, digital cameras, Memory Cards, a comprehensive range of cables, surge protectors, UPS's, and many more. Computer Parts We sell and stock hard drives, memory, cases, powers supplies, motherboards, CPU's and a wide range of LCD monitors.

 

"If it is IT we will do our best to get it for you"
